About Us

We are Elizabeth and Dan, adventure travel couple behind Our Whereabouts! We began dating in 2016 and quickly discovered that we both have a passion for travel adventure when we booked a month-long trip to Thailand after only 7 months of dating. Since then we have absolutely fallen in love with exploring the world, particularly off the beaten paths. We are based in Israel, work hard, save up, and always have a trip booked on the horizon. When we get back from our trips we are always eager to share our stories, helpful tips, and beautiful photos. Why our whereabouts? Because our family and friends are constantly asking us for our whereabouts since we never seem to be in the country. Our mission is to document and share authentic outdoor adventure experiences across the globe, share engaging stories with professional photos and provide beneficial, informative tips, itineraries, travel guides, to-do lists, where to stay, and more.

Every step leads us to new opportunities and colors our experiences with beautiful photos.

Follow us along as we travel to new and exciting destinations

Our Whereabouts xxx

Services

Photography & Videography

We get to know your product, service or destination and aim to spread your message the best way possible. We offer video/photo content creation for your brand to use as ads, on your website, or own social media pages.

Collaborations

Our community of over 17,000 followers is made of people who are passionate about outdoors and adventure. By promoting your products or services on our social media you will naturally connect with your target audience and it create awareness to your product and increase revenue. We offer posts, stories, giveaways, social media takeovers and brand ambassadorships.

Blogging

Detailed product review post.Whether you offer a product or service, tourism board or travel company looking to promote your business online, we are here to help!

Reviews

In 2016, Candy and Jonty helped me turn my passion into a career. We brainstormed together and got all my ideas out on paper which was the beginning of my fitness business, CazFit. (I still have that piece of paper we scribbled all my ideas on.) They also did some corporate branding for me (I have 4 pages of different logo designs she helped me with, they also designed my double-sided business cards and my invoice template).
Their work ethic went above and beyond my expectations, and Candy made herself available to my requests at all hours.
I also hired them to consult me with my social media pages. After helping me setup my business Facebook page and Instagram page, they taught me the basics of social media management so I have been able to manage my accounts myself.
Their service really is incredible and I'm definitely going to be going to them to redesign my website. I wouldn't go to anyone else! 😁
